channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-15916] Upgrade Maven Surefire plugin to 3.0.0-M1
item.description: Recently all the unit tests are failing. This is caused by the latest Java 8 issue reported at SUREFIRE-1588 and fixed in Maven Surefire plugin 3.0.0-M1. We need to update the plugin.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

This message was automatically generated.
I could reproduce the following test failures in Docker environment (via start-build-env.sh), and the configuration fixed the error.
Rethinking this, it's better to upgrade maven surefire plugin to 3.0.0-M1 instead of workaround SUREFIRE-1588. I'll update the title of this issue and upload a patch shortly.

+1, thanks for fixing this ajisakaa. Feel free to commit this as you know which branch it needs to land.

Thanks.

Thanks cheersyang for reviewing this. Committed this to trunk, branch-3.2, branch-3.1, and branch-3.0.
I'll check if branch-2 and downstream branches are affected.
branch-2* are not affected because Java 7 is used for precommit test.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #15397 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/15397/)
HADOOP-15916. Upgrade Maven Surefire plugin to 3.0.0-M1. (aajisaka: rev a736b5da15084e8eb93d2f68f8eccc506ff7bea7)

  • (edit) hadoop-project/pom.xml

ajisakaa, I afraid this change doesn't fully fix the problem. The VM crash error still appears:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-709?focusedCommentId=16682285&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-16682285

[ERROR] ExecutionException The forked VM terminated without properly saying goodbye. VM crash or System.exit called?
